General.Name: Exasol AG
General.Description: Exasol AG develops database for analytics and data warehousing in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Great Britain, North America, and internationally. It provides solutions to retail and e-commerce, finance analytics, and healthcare sectors. Exasol AG was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Nuremberg, Germany.
